title: Font inquiries
content:
Does anyone know where I can obtain these fonts, or contact the designers who made the fonts?

Samy Halim  
-------------------------  
- Swingo (Union Fonts)  
- Barbapapa (Union Fonts)

Robert Bell  
--------------------------  
- Zeon (Union Fonts)

Cristian Gonzalez  
-----------------------------  
- Origen (Union Fonts)

--------------------------------  
TCL Antillanca  
ATOMICA  
TCL Cachito  
TCL Elemental Serif  
TCL Uniprint  
TCL Llanquihue  
TCL Deluxe  
Amster  
Queltehue Regular  
La Tercera  
TCL Emilian  
TCL ESCUELERA  
TCL ESTACION  
TCL HUEAITAS  
TCL EXPENDIO  
TCL INDOSANS  
TCL LLANQUIHUE  
TCL MAPOCHO  
TCL MECHADA  
MENU  
TCL Papas  
TCL Ropio  
TCL Solobuses

TCL Uniprint

--------------------------------

Cadena  
Fidel Black  
Jara  
Pintana  
Picara  
Slightest  
Patua Regular
author: jch02140

comments.content:
Well, I'd do my searching through Luc Devroye's site.

so, for Samy Halim,

[http://luc.devroye.org/fonts-25503.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140710025719/http:/luc.devroye.org/fonts-25503.html "http://luc.devroye.org/fonts-25503.html")

which reports "he recently joined Typotek, where he did Plastik (2002) and Swingo (2002). Since 2003, he is associated with Union Fonts."

Also, on the Dafont site, this was given as an email  
halimsamy(AT)yahoo.fr

A lot of work ahead of you, maybe...
